alert.note: Alert for Rapides (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 07 at 7:04PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm with heavy rainfall will impact portions of northeastern Rapides Parish through 800 PM CST... At 703 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Boyce, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and high rainfall rates. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Alexandria, Pineville, Boyce, Alexandria International Airport, Ball, Kingsville, Libuse, Tioga, Timber Trails, Esler Regional Airport, Gardner and Paradise. This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 84 and 102. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
